org.youscope.addon.tool

Interface ToolAddonFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomJobToolFactory, CustomMicroplatesFactory, DeviceSettingManagerFactory, FluigentControllerFactory, LiveStreamFactory, MeasurementViewerFactory, MultiCameraAndColorStreamFactory, MultiColorStreamFactory, MultiStreamFactory, NemesysControllerFactory, OnixControllerFactory, OpenHouseFactory, PositionControlFactory, ScriptingToolFactory, SlimIdentificationFactory, TemplateToolFactory, ToolAddonFactoryAdapter, YouPongFactory

    public interface ToolAddonFactory
    Author:
    langmo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ToolAddonUI createToolUI(java.lang.String typeIdentifier, YouScopeClient client, YouScopeServer server)
      Returns the UI of a Tool for the given type identifier.
      java.lang.String[] getSupportedTypeIdentifiers()
      Returns all tool type identifiers supported by this addon
      ToolMetadata getToolMetadata(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
      Returns the metadata (like human readable name) for the tool with the given type identifier.
      boolean isSupportingTypeIdentifier(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
      Returns true if this addon supports tools with the given type identifier, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • createToolUI

        ToolAddonUI createToolUI(java.lang.String typeIdentifier,
                         YouScopeClient client,
                         YouScopeServer server)
                  throws AddonException
        Returns the UI of a Tool for the given type identifier. If tools with the given type identifier are not supported by this factory, throws an AddonException.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The type identifier of the tool.
        client - YouScope client.
        server - YouScope server.
        Returns:
        The created tool UI.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if tools with given type identifier are not supported by this factory.*

      • getSupportedTypeIdentifiers

        java.lang.String[] getSupportedTypeIdentifiers()
        Returns all tool type identifiers supported by this addon
        Returns:
        Tool type identifiers.

      • isSupportingTypeIdentifier

        boolean isSupportingTypeIdentifier(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
        Returns true if this addon supports tools with the given type identifier, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The type identifier of the tool for which it should be queried if this addon supports it.
        Returns:
        True if this addon supports tools with the given type identifier, false otherwise.

      • getToolMetadata

        ToolMetadata getToolMetadata(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
                      throws AddonException
        Returns the metadata (like human readable name) for the tool with the given type identifier.
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The type identifier of the tool for which the metadata should be returned.
        Returns:
        The metadata of the given tool.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if type identifier is not supported by the factory.
